title: Global Health & Innovation Summit 2026
short_details: Defining the next decade of clinical epidemiology and data-driven healthcare policy.
full_details: The Global Health & Innovation Summit 2026 is INCLEN's flagship event, bringing together researchers, policymakers, and practitioners from across 34 countries. This year's theme focuses on 'Resilient Health Systems: Leveraging Data for Impact'. The summit will feature keynote addresses from WHO representatives, interactive workshops on demographic surveillance, and networking sessions for institutional partners.

title: Technical Workshop: Vaccine Effectiveness
short_details: Standardizing surveillance protocols for new vaccine introductions in developing nations.
full_details: This technical workshop is designed for Clinical Epidemiology Units (CEUs) and site investigators. We will cover the latest methodologies for monitoring vaccine effectiveness in real-world settings, focusing on the SOMAARTH surveillance sites' data collection frameworks. Participants will receive training on new digital tools for adverse event reporting.

title: Annual Research Dissemination Meeting
short_details: Closing the 2025 cycle with high-impact maternal and child health surveillance results.
full_details: The annual dissemination meeting concluded with significant insights into maternal health trends across northern India. Key stakeholders from MoHFW and ICMR attended the session. The report highlighted a 15% improvement in community-level health tracking through digital interventions.
